path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Shuna Inuverse Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and getExcludedBalances() uses a loop to iterate through excludedFromRewards list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Dev fee issue
findings.description: Dev fee increases on sell, but this setting is not taken into account in swapAndRedirectEthFees() function.
